title: RHOA Kandi Cares + Brian Michael Smith (Actor, 9-1-1: Lonestar)
itunes:title: RHOA Kandi Cares + Brian Michael Smith (Actor, 9-1-1: Lonestar)
itunes:subtitle: Danny starts off by breaking down the Housewives news: Covid hits RHONY, Braunwyn paparazzi photos, RHOSLC reunion lewks. Next up is this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured a Kandi charity events, Richard, and more! After Bravo talk...
description:
Danny starts off by breaking down the Housewives news: Covid hits RHONY, Braunwyn paparazzi photos, RHOSLC reunion lewks. Next up is this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured a Kandi charity events, Richard, and more! After Bravo talk, Danny interviews actor and trans activist Brian Michael Smith from 9-1-1 Lonestar to talk about the upcoming season (airing Mondays on Fox), trans representation, and more!


Brian Michael Smith Interview: 23:50ish
